channel.title: Adding Corporal beast[PI]

item.title: Adding Corporal beast[PI]
item.dc:creator: @sketzo sketzo
item.description:
@sketzo wrote:

Where should i add this in entitydef.java?

if(i == 1) { entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.models = new int[1]; entityDef.models[0] = 44733; entityDef.standingAnim = 10056; entityDef.walkingAnim = 10055; entityDef.combatLevel = 785; entityDef.name = "Corporeal beast"; entityDef.description = "A vision of supernatural horror.".getBytes(); }
